explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing this task are the Potato, Pot, Spoon, Knife, SoapBottle, and Cup. The potato needs to be cooked in the microwave, so the Pot will likely be used for heating it. The Spoon or Knife may be used to handle the potato. After cooking, the heated piece of sliced potato should then be placed in the sink, which may involve the use of the SoapBottle and Cup.
